name: qrcode
content_security_policy: script-src 'self'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 http://i.data.api.lianjia.com/v2/meta/vrheatmap http://api.data.lianjia.com/Api/apiPlat/verifySign; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' https://api.pwmqr.com/qrcode/create;
